Value:

{register int m;                                              \
    if (set != 0)                                               \
      {                                                         \
        bit = 31;                                               \
        if (set != 0x80000000) {                                \
          if ((m = (set & 0x0000ffff))) {set = m; bit -= 16;}   \
          if ((m = (set & 0x00ff00ff))) {set = m; bit -= 8;}    \
          if ((m = (set & 0x0f0f0f0f))) {set = m; bit -= 4;}    \
          if ((m = (set & 0x33333333))) {set = m; bit -= 2;}    \
          if ((m = (set & 0x55555555))) {set = m; bit -= 1;}}}  \
    else bit = -1;}
